name: Flappy Monster (DevEternity)
description:
It’s a fun pixel game, don’t look at its simple form but extremely difficult. It has a simple but not rough pixel picture, a little monster with a sluggish look, and a few white clouds.

Gameplay
You need to constantly control the frequency of clicking on the screen to adjust the flying height and landing speed of the monster, so that the monster can smoothly pass through the pipe gap on the right side of the screen. If the monster accidentally wipes and touches the tube, the game is over.

How to start
After loading the game, click the start button
